alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 4:35PM MST until January 11 at 9:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Dona Ana County, Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley and West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet. In Texas, Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
